definition: the world of Chinese opera/theatrical circles
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe

sentences.english: Qin Jianfu was a famous playwright in the late Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 秦簡夫是活躍於元代後期劇壇上的知名作家。

sentences.english: Position of "single-scene" Duanju in Ming Dynasty is not ignored.
sentences.chinese: 明代一折短劇在明代劇壇上佔有不可忽視的地位。
